frontMatter.title: Open Night at Claremont Stadium
frontMatter.summary: Join us this Wednesday for an open night at Claremont Stadium with all courts open and a session for future legends.

prev.title: Badminton Night Alert!
prev.summary: Join us for a night of badminton practice and fun at Claremont Stadium. All courts open for all skill levels!

next.title: Join Us for Beginner Club Night at Navan Badminton Club
next.summary: Join Navan Badminton Club for a fun Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium this Thursday from 9pm - 11pm. All skill levels welcome!
